description: This file is an HTML document that contains embedded JavaScript code defining a Calculator class extending a Service, and code to initialize and register this service with a ServiceManager. It serves as a client-side script for a web-based or embedded application, facilitating remote procedure calls via JavaScript.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A service class extending Service, providing 'add' and 'sub' methods for remote invocation.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a list of numbers and returns the sum as a Promise.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Subtracts the second parameter from the first and returns the result as a Promise.
